page.description: The A5.SCRIPT_ENUM() method returns a CR-LF delimited list of all saved global scripts.

prototypes.prototype: Script_List as C = :A5.SCRIPT_ENUM( [ object_enum_flags as N ] )
Next_Script_Name as C = :A5.SCRIPT_ENUM( lastname as C )

argument.name: Script_List
argument.description: A list of scripts in various formats, depending on the Flag variable.

argument.name: Next_Script_Name
argument.description: The next script in the list of scripts.

item.name: Null = Script name, full path, and filename.
4 = Object type, script name, full path, and filename
8 = Quoted script name, full path, and filename.
12 = Object type, quoted script name, full path, and filename formatted for tree control.

argument.name: lastname
argument.description: The quoted name of a script.
